FuncDef: The reset qos default flow-queue statistics command clears statistics about flow queues on a specified channelized sub-interface.
CLIs: reset qos default flow-queue statistics interface { <interface-name> | <interface-type> <interface-number> } outbound

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies the outbound direction of an interface.
-

Specifies the type of an interface.
-

Specifies the number of an interface.
-

Specifies the name of an interface.
The value is a string of 1 to 63 characters.

Examples: <HUAWEI> reset qos default flow-queue statistics interface GigabitEthernet 1/0/0.1 outbound
ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
To clear statistics about flow queues on a specified channelized sub-interface, run the reset qos default flow-queue statistics command.
Prerequisites
The channelization function has been enabled using the mode channel enable command.
